price: Wanda ya yi ɗã'a ga Manzo, to, haƙĩƙa, yã yi ɗã'a ga Allah. Kuma wanda ya jũya bãya, to, ba Mu aike ka ba don ka zama mai tsaro a kansu.
arabic: مَّن يُطِعِ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَقَدۡ أَطَاعَ ٱللَّهَۖ وَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ فَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man yuṭiʿi al-rasūla faqad aṭāʿa al-laha waman tawallā famā arsalnāka ʿalayhim ḥafīẓan
